sentences.english: We should have our only methods when doing things, and shouldn't imitate others mechanically.
sentences.chinese: 我們做事得有自己的方法，不能邯鄲學步。

sentences.english: From this fable comes the idiom Learn to walk in Handan.
sentences.chinese: “邯鄲學步”這個成語就是從這則傳說而來的。

sentences.english: Renaissance zone is located in southern Hebei Province, Handan urban western.
sentences.chinese: 復興區位於河北省南部，邯鄲市區西部。

sentences.english: When Pang Gong returned from Han Dan, the king of the state of Wei did not want to see him any more.
sentences.chinese: 當龐恭從邯鄲返回時，魏王已經不想再見他了。

sentences.english: Since then, the Handan area, it left a groom to marry the daughter-in-law to discredit custom face.
sentences.chinese: 自此，邯鄲一帶，便留下了新郎娶媳婦抹黑臉的風俗。

sentences.english: Fengfeng mine is located in southern Hebei Province, Handan City is one of the major urban areas.
sentences.chinese: 峯峯礦區位於河北省南部，是邯鄲市的重要城區之一。

sentences.english: As Hangang expands, it is building workers' dormitories at its construction sites.
sentences.chinese: 邯鄲不斷擴展城市規模，圖爲建築工地上的工人宿舍。

sentences.english: The characters in planning and design of Congtai pcnjing garden in Handan city are described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了邯鄲市叢臺盆景園規劃設計的特點。

sentences.english: As soon as he arrived in Handan, he was dazzled to find that everything was novel.
sentences.chinese: 一到邯鄲，他感到處處新鮮，簡直令人眼花繚亂。

sentences.english: One year, the State of Qin sent troops to attack Zhao and surrounded the capital of Handan.
sentences.chinese: 有一年，秦國出兵攻打趙國，並已經包圍了都城邯鄲。

sentences.english: Therefore, Shexian can Handan transit point for access to all parts of the country.
sentences.chinese: 因此，涉縣可以以邯鄲爲中轉站通往全國各地。

sentences.english: Government officials in Handan also declined to discuss the plant.
sentences.chinese: 邯鄲市政府官員也拒絕討論邯鋼的問題。

sentences.english: Its original meaning is to try to learn the Handan people's walking posture.
sentences.chinese: “邯鄲學步”這個成語是指在邯鄲學習步法。

sentences.english: Its original meaning is to try to learn the Handan people's walking posture.
sentences.chinese: “邯鄲學步”這個成語是指在邯鄲學習步法。

sentences.english: Handan Culture Art Center is a large-scale public building with a complicated shape.
sentences.chinese: 邯鄲文化藝術中心是一個體型複雜的大型公共建築。
